titleStmt.title: PRVDENTISSIMI AC POTENTISSIMI PRINCIPIS IACOBI, I. DEI GRATIA, MAGNAE Britanniae, Franciae, & Hiberniae, Regis: &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: PRVDENTISSIMI AC POTENTISSIMI PRINCIPIS IACOBI, I. DEI GRATIA, MAGNAE Britanniae, Franciae, & Hiberniae, Regis: &c.

monogr.title: Christs starre: or, A Christian treatise for our direction to our Sauiour, and for our conjunction with him : Declaring Christs excellencie, our necessitie of him, his great loue and manifold mercies bestowed vpon vs; as also some of our duties. By W. Narne p. of Dysert
monogr.author: Narne, William

div.head: PRVDENTISSIMI AC POTENTISSIMI PRINCIPIS IACOBI, I. DEI GRATIA, MAGNAE Britanniae, Franciae, & Hiberniae, Regis: &c.
div.p: Praeclarissimotum Prophetarum Dauidis atque Mosis verbis concepta paraenesis.

q.p: Carole fili mi, agnosce Deum patris tui, & cole eum corde integro, & animo studioso: quia omnia corda exquirit Iehoua, & quodque figmentum cogitationum intelligit: si exquisiueris eum, invenietur abs te: sed si dereliqueris eum, reijciet te in perpetuum.
Quare elige vitam, diligend • Iehouam Deum tuum, auscultando voci eius, & adharendo ei, vt vivas tu cum semine tuo.
